column4: Have you used Automatix or anything like that?
true, the package that broke the upgrade is nvidia-glx
I don't see why it didn't keep upgrading the other files instead of just stopping
Well, you should be in #ubuntu+1 then.
it was more of a general upgrading question then a gutsy-related one, I've had the same problem with each upgrade
Well, if you don't use Automatix or Envy, you should by fine.
na I stopped using those scripts a long time ago
Could you run < aptitude show linux-restricted-modules-`uname -r` | grep State > ?
I assume that's a good thing?
silent, thanks for the help guys/girls (whichever fits you ;P ), it's the first time I actually come to IRC and get an answer other then 'RTFM' ;)
